channel.title: Moumantai Motherfuckers
channel.description: Explore a free webcomic-based static site generator delivered through GitHub!
channel.dc:creator: htfcuddles

item.title: Page 0
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
The idea that sparked this comic had been in development for a while, along with a lot of world building.
However, the comic itself was started randomly in an inspiration moment, and finished in record time between commissions.

I will talk about things like how this comic returned me the motivation and love I had for drawing comics once I post the last page of this chapter. But right now, enjoy this comic.

This is not going to be a fetish comic. Its actually marked as a 15+ comic due to swearing and touching some dark topics- stuff that comes with the territory when we're talking about rock and metal music.

item.title: Page 23
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Chapter 2 is complete.

To be honest, I hadn’t made a “website” for this comic before because I feared, like it happened with many other projects, that I’d lose steam and it would end in nothing, in addition to the fact that this comic is, in a lot of ways, a platform to practice and improve. But all I can say is that this comic is going to continue. This project has motivated me immensely not only to improve my art but also to recover the love for such a marvelous profession.

This will be the last update for a bit. When chapter 3 is done I’ll start posting it one page a day, like I did with this one.

Thank you very much for reading this.

See you when Chapter 3 begins!

Also, as a fun bit of trivia: November 12nd is Rowi’s birthday! Yes, I created him exactly one year ago, and that was the seed that set up all this comic in motion. Some other day I’ll tell the whole story, including how this started just as vrchat characters.

item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description: One thing that is kind of difficult to convey not just in comic pages but in general is how immense the universe is. The scale is so enormous that our brains cannot process it properly. In a way its like trying to comprehend how much money 1 trillion dollars are. No, you cannot imagine it physically.

item.title: Page 27
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Final page of Chapter 4.

Not gonna lie, this chapter was one of the most fun I’ve had drawing comics in eons. A lot of things happened not just in the plot (that is finally moving forward) but also regarding the development of this piece.
I hope you liked it. While this is a personal work, I also got some help from some peeps (you can check them in the credits section) and I feel that thanks to them this comic is shaping to be something even better than I envisioned it at first.

Chapter 5 will start coming sometime in May, and is going to be a lot shorter than this one. That’s mainly about it, though. Thank you very much for reading this comic, I appreciate it! And see you then!

item.title: Page 17
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
This is it. Chapter 5 is complete.

I am very aware that technically this chapter felt like a mess, with a lot of lore being dropped all of a sudden. The next chapter, however, goes back to the more happy vibe, even if it’s going to be crazy. At least this chapter I finally set up to properly introduce Horkers, that had a small apparition even back in Chapter 1, and also explained why Earth is so welcoming to aliens.

With this I also celebrate... 100 pages! Woohoo!

When I started this I was scared over the idea of not being able to complete 30 pages. But look at this <3 I’m going to celebrate with... actually i cant celebrate right now, I gotta go to sleep because tomorrow i have RL appointments to do. But this saturday or sunday I’m probably going to celebrate with chips and soda.

Thank you peeps for looking at this story. I hope youre liking it so far.

See you in Chapter 6!

item.title: Page 19
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Final page of this chapter. So far this is my most favorite chapter for several reasons, but the main one is because this gave me the perfect excuse to gather the whole family together and being able to showcase their personalities some more.

Like always, I’m going to take a couple months to draw the next chapter, along with other unrelated stuff I’m working on. Chapter 7 should start coming in early September or, if I manage to hurry up, sometime mid August. See you then!

item.title: Page 7
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Russet: Being in the dark is soothing for Vampire Bunnies, hiding in the dark to be safe from predators helps them feel secure. It is not an instinct but a learned social response they develop whilst growing up.
htf: I think I mentioned this (although I admit vaguely) on the lore page for chapter 2.

Song the band is covering: Pat Benatar - Invincible

item.title: Page 8
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Russet: 8th August 2023, that's the day Vic originally posted this comic.
It's also the day Vic appeared in my DMs and asked me to be his co-writer. It'd been commenting and talking and enthusing his ear off about MMF for about 8 months by this point.
I was not expecting to be asked, but I was honoured to say yes. I love this comic, the world Vic and I guess by extension I have helped to create. I love talking MMF lore and through it I found family too!
Found family is a big, huge massive theme for us in the story and well I found Vic! My crazy big huge bunny brother <3
So this comic will always be super special.

htf: Bringing you here was the absolute best decision I ever made. <3

You can listen here to Moumantai Motherfuckers - Let the Dragons Fly [Live at the Ultra Music Festival 58]!

item.title: Page 10
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description: When I wrote that text conversation I considered going over the top, but ended grounding it a bit. And even tho I feel it's still a bit exaggerated, I got some comments telling me that it was a very creepy toxic one and actually realistic to an extent. I don't know if feeling proud or dirty for such accomplishment.

htf: BLOCK THAT MOTHERFUCKER D

item.title: Page 13
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Families and Packs

Russet: Nau & Khi are very traditional bunnies and very much dislike the idea of having a kid then just abandoning it. Not because you are ill or have no choice but just straight up walking out on them.
htf: More than "traditional", I'd say that it's the opposite to "The Bunny Way". And it's an interesting angle that will be explained in due time, considering how due to the dangers of their planet, bunny society is relatively desensitized to bunnies dying to the perils of "The Land".

item.title: Page 14
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Russet: This page makes me hungry, despite the super serious conversation all that food looks great!
htf: I tried my best

item.title: Page 15
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Russet: The fact Mekari is on the FLOOR BELOW to have a conversation with Roi and is still taller the her is just fantastic! Also yeah Roi the stripes do not work!
htf: This is even more insane when you remember that -technically speaking- Sleriki are blind, they can only see heat. I wonder if he can see the stripes due to the "heat" of each color or something like that.

item.title: Page 19
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description: I still love these backgrounds

item.title: Page 20
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Chapter complete.

This was one of the most interesting chapters I’ve done of this comic, and one of the ones I enjoyed making the most. There are many things that were set up here, from giving Sher’s parents proper depth and importance, to set up the scenario for a lot of the plots to come in a future.
Chapter 8 will take a while to make, and I expect it to come out during November. However, I’ll try to post something cute in September 17th to celebrate this comic’s first anniversary! Woohoo!
I want to thank everyone who has read this and shared it around and liked it and all that sort of stuff. You’re awesome. And I hope things get even better from now on!
Talk to you later!

=======
Russet: So this was the first full chapter I helped on with pacing and ideas and words. I also discovered Victor is not allowed to use the word In or On without supervision. In Spanish they are the same word "en" so untangling the weird arse context behind which one to use in English is baffling for a non-native speaker.
Heck it is baffling for a native speaker at times, you just sort of have to... read the sentence and I instinctively know if it is "On a planet" or "In a planet" but I couldn't explain WHY not properly.

htf: Hey it's not my fault that english people must figure out that being in the fridge is not the same that being on the fridge or being at the fridge but then you can be at the apartment, in the apartment on the apartment complex. AAAHHHHH

item.title: Page 1
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Russet: We did a anniversary intermission! Daniel!! He got Antlers.
htf: They were gonna grow back :D

item.title: Page 2
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description: Second intermission page

item.title: Page 3
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Russet: Ever wonder why Mekari fluctuates between lorge and not quite so lorge? It's not lazy drawing, it is down to some behind the scenes Sleriki lore concerning how their bio-cycle works over the year. I can't explain it all here Vic would tell me off for writing a 20,000 word essay on Alien Slime Anatomy, just trust me Sleriki are just cool!
htf: They shed excess mass and regain it as they eat. Its quite simple. I know Russet just wants to write his 20K word essay tho, gotta think where to post it. Maybe on a species-themed wiki article or something?

item.title: Page 4
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
With this… I want to finally celebrate the first anniversary of this comic! While technically the first page was done on September 19th and some of the characters had been created long before, it was a sketch the one that kickstarted the whole comic idea and that one was made on September 17th, 2022.

Last year I was working but I had lost most of my love for art due to multiple reasons. I decided to start this comic because “If I don’t do it now i will never do it”. And it ended becoming a sort of miracle cure: Working on this brought me back all the love I had for arting. And while properly getting back into the groove was extremely hard (couple with a lot of RL reasons), this comic helped me to regain my sanity and the appreciation for everything.

I decided to pour here everything I had learned so far. Writing. Trying to make a story that didnt rely on crude jokes, edgy stories just for the sake of being edgy, and trying to keep it SFW to an extent.

Chapter 1 didn’t have much writing on it beforehand (just a vague note); I was trying to just “draw, don’t stop”. I was also afraid of losing interest (like has happened with most of my stuff before) so I wasn’t sure how far I was going to reach with this (and that’s why I didn’t try to make a page like this for the comic at first). But I carried on. And started properly writing the story I wanted. I look at it now and its insane for me to think that I have an actual proper story, a lot of characters and relationships that feel natural.

This story is what I think is my magnum opus and I’m putting all I know, learned and have into it. However, saying I’ve done this alone would be super false. I tried to put in the credits the peeps who have helped me in one way or another, and I want to sincerely thank not only them, but also you, the reader, for your interest and for reading this, and also to everyone who shares this and so. I hope to continue making a story you like.

See you during November or December when chapter 8 comes!

  • htf

Chapter 9 should come mid February. See you then!

And remember, every Monday we’ll get a new chapter of the Voyages of the Odyssey!

item.title: Page 0
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Heyo everyone. There are a lot of things I need to talk about.

First one, chapter 9 will be delayed until mid-to-late March. There are several things going on behind curtains.

The first change I’m doing is editing every single instance of Sher or any vampire bunnies. If you reread chapters 1 and 2 you’ll notice the change is already present in there.

Why that?

This is the thing. Sher’s species is based off a vrchat avatar. It’s properly credited and all. However, if I ever want to monetize aspects of the comic (e.g. selling a side story, or making merch in a future or commissioning an anime of the comic [ok that’d be incredible but way too expensive lmao] or so), that species doesn’t belong to me.

Nobody has told me anything. I’m doing the changes proactively to avoid any issues down the line. Better now that I have to modify around 170 pages, that in a year when I will have around 300.

And being very honest, I feel that the new tail fits them more and they feel a lot more personal. So yes. The changes are being applied retroactively, but its an immense task to tackle. You’ll see that older chapters will be getting updated little by little.

What about Avali? I didn’t create Avali. It’s true, but at the same time Avali were released under a creative commons license that does allow me to do things with them.

But that isn’t all. Along with the updates, I’m adding proper transcriptions of all the panels, like I started doing in chapter 6. When I finish, the whole comic will have them, making easier for people to translate them or to have a screen reader or anything of sorts. Chapters 1 and 2 have theirs already done. I added a couple easter eggs too, like linking to actually one of the songs that the band played, or adding a whole section to the page describing bunny lore. These details will be more common as I fix more and the comic goes on.

And finally, besides fixing grammar in some panels (I uploaded these pages before having my co-writer helping me with it), I’m updating some of the older pages to fit the current much better developed lore. When I started the comic, over all during the first two or three chapters, there were aspects I hadn’t planned thoroughly -e.g. the Horker King’s personality-, aspects that now are well planned to the detail. If you reread the comic, you’ll notice that some things that weren’t put in detail before, or that looked just added in without a proper reason, now have one. Also there are several little panel details that reflect these lore updates. It’s worth mentioning, the story is not changing. You can decide not to reread the comic, and that’ll be absolutely fine; you should have no issues. But the changes will benefit new readers a lot, mainly for clarity.

All that been said, that’s not the reason why Chapter 9 is being delayed; the “fixing older pages” is not something I’m investing all my time in. There were other things going on (in real life) that required me to slow down temporally. So yes, the comic will come (and its already being worked on), but its going to come in the middle of March.

That’s essentially what I had to say. Thank you very much for reading! I love you all. You’re awesome.

item.title: Page 21
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Finally, chapter 9 is done along with Sher’s backstory arc. I hope you liked it! Working this chapter was extremely fun, considering its the very first chapter that has actual real life places in it.

The next chapter will start being worked sometime in May and it’ll likely come out in mid/late June or early July, depending on my speed making the pages (since I am working in other stuff along this comic, pages tend to come out slowly).

I want to thank everyone reading this story <3 I appreciate it more than it may look, and comments/feedback are welcome.

Anyways, see you in June or July!

  • htf

item.title: Page 0
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Hello everyone! Some info about chapter 10.
Like has been happening for several chapters, stuff is going behind curtains. A new arc is starting and its gonna be a fun one; Russet and I have been planning it thoroughly and we hope you’ll like it.
One thing I’m trying, in addition to working on other work and commissions and the such, is to raise the overall quality of the panels and pages. I wanna believe it’s been noticeable in the last chapter too xD
And regarding changing old pages’ panels to fit Sher’s new design and updating minor details (like song lyrics and stuff), it’s done completely with chapters 1, 2, 3 and 9 (Chapter 9 was drawn from the beginning like that). I’ll do it eventually with chapters 4, 5, 6, 7 and 8.
That’s it for now. Remember, if you like this comic, share it with your friends!
See you all!

  • Vic

Russet: This is the best chapter cover, for mysterious reasons that are not at all related to MEKARI <3
Also believe it or not I went and made my fursona a Sleriki… I've always been a shapeshifter and now I am a sci-fi space slime who turns into other things! Sleriki are cool

htf: >w< I'm honored

item.title: Page 20
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Finally, chapter 10 is done! This chapter was special in the sense we’re starting a new arc, and we have big plans for it. I hope you liked it! The next chapter should (hopefully) come out in October or November.

Working on this was fun because not only we had to come up with lore for more species (the Unmizu are a species I had created some years ago but without lore) but also because we finally could start showing the Horker king. So far most of the info about horkers had been talked about, not shown, and finally we can move on to the “show them” phase.

That’s all about Chapter 10! Immense thanks to my co-writer Russet for helping with this. The next chapters will also tie the story properly with the Voyages of the Odyssey. And yes, the “second season” is being written, but we don’t expect to have it done anytime soon. Or at least not before chapter 12, I think.

Now, for the future: On the technical side of things, there are chances (not decided yet) that the next chapters will switch away from the toning effect; not only because I have been growing to not to like it as much (it looks bad at some screen resolutions) but because I’ll be switching tools. I usually use Clip Studio Paint for the pages, but I’m trying Krita. It won’t be a “sudden change”- the next chapter will be made with both tools- but I need to adapt, and the toning tools arent as well developed or easy to find. But we will see how it goes. What I mean is that the next chapter will change “coloring” styles; my goal is to keep the manga-styled look but making it look better.

That’s about it for now! See you!

Now, regarding chapter 11, it was started and I hope having it done mid to late October. I hope you like it
I’ve visited this country 4 times already and I keep saying, Döner Kebab und Käsebrötchen gehören zu den leckersten Dingen, die ich je gegessen habe. Deutschland, dein Essen ist erstklassig.

item.title: Page 17
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Finally, chapter complete. Slightly shorter (I try to keep the chapters close to 20 pages long), but the story is moving forward.
This chapter, and the next one, are chapters that will be slow, because of some RL reasons, including me moving away sometime in January or February, if things go as I expect. This means that instead of focusing on MMF I am focusing on earning money (commission wise) to save for said move.
If I’m honest, I think chapter 12 will come out sometime around April or May, but like said, everything will depend on how things go. But the comic will continue, as we’re finally approaching some very interesting chapters in the timeline.
Finally, as always, I wanna thank all my readers… or actually I should say “our readers” because the comic isnt “mine alone” anymore. xD But yeah, thank you so much for following this <3 If ya have any feedback on it, I’d love to read it.
See you! You’re awesome!
- Vic

Russet: Big important chapter, we had a lot of fun working on the lore and history here!
htf: I loved it

item.title: Page 0
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Hello, friends, and happy new year!
Chapter 12 is in the works, and if everything goes smoothly, it should start being posted mid to late February. Enjoy its cover page.
In the “real life” side of things, I’m saving money, working on stuff and yeah. Ko-fi.
There isn’t much more to add, besides that RL has been hectic the last couple months, something I did talk about when I posted the last page of the previous chapter. Luckily we wont have to wait til May for the next chapter xD
That’s about it for now. Cheers!

PS: Voyages of the Odyssey, the story happening in MMF’s universe written by Russet (my co-writer) is being updated every Friday :3

Russet: Ahhhh more Voyages!!!!!!

item.title: Page 1
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description: It begins.

item.title: Page 2
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Russet: AHHHHH I went a bit AHHHHH at this page.
Vic surprised me with this flash back I never expected Seinu to show up int he comic ever! SO this was like wow totally unexpected but also a bit AHHHH

htf: For context. When I decided to invite Russet to co-write the comic with me, he was working in an earlier version of Voyages of the Odyssey, and the story was great and, for me, a great way to deepen some of the lore that couldn't be talked about in the comic without breaking flow. So I did. The thing is, from that moment (Chapter 7) I knew already that Seinu was going to appear in the comic in a way or another. And while the apparition is very minor, all things considered, it's very important in general. Also, he and his pack will appear again in a future chapter.

item.title: Page 3
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
End of the flashback

item.title: Page 15
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Travel!

Russet: I had one fan ask me why the adult bunnies are climbing D here.
You have to remember most bunnies do not live to Elder status due to the dangers of the planet.
So the majority of the population are younglings and young adults.
It is part of why Elders are so respected, they have survived to reach Elder status.

htf: At least until now.

item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Helping around

Russet: I like eye-patch Elder
Notice how BIG Elders get too, all bunnies will get this LORGE if they live that long.

htf: They keep growing :D

item.dc:creator: htfcuddles

Bunny lifestyle

Russet: Sorry Sher >.> Diplomatic Textbooks are really boring! but hey Seinu sent you all the good ones!

Song D is playing to Saye: Stone Sour - Through Glass (Full live version)

item.title: Page 19
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
They’re coming.

Russet: I did have someone ask me where is the Odyssey when this is going on. After all they care about Bunnies and whilst the Illuminate cannot officially help the Odyssey could have been nearby.
Sadly time-line wise the Odyssey is on its way to Earth right now.

htf: Its important to mention that the Odyssey visit to BPE was a year or two ago. The Odyssey has more diplomatic appointments across the Universe.

Russet: Also Mekari doesn't quite fit inside the command room of the Iron he is too LORGE.

htf: That's been a recurring gag by now

item.title: Page 0
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description: Chapter 13 Cover Page

item.title: Page 1
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
And it begins!

Russet: I love the fact Ck'akk and her pack sleep together, Avali packs love to just be together and rarely sleep apart. Here she is the most important Avali in space, Intergalactic Ruler of the Avali Empire and she sleeps with a cute plush.

htf: They may be the most powerful Avali but in the end, they're normal people.

item.title: Page 2
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Proposition

Russet: Sher trying to put his Diplomatic learning to good use.

htf: I mean, that's exactly what his diplomatic learning was for

item.title: Page 3
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
what

Russet: Rowi!!!

item.title: Page 4
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Politics

Russet: We wanted to make it clear here that Rowi had overstepped the mark here. The Illuminate COULD have walked away from it and left Sawi's pack responsible for what her brother just did.
This would have bankrupted the Ouakkia pack pretty badly. They'd have found themselves cut off and bounced out the bottom of the pack Hierarchy or cut off as an Independent pack.
So the fact Ck'akk wants to find a way to make it work is a good sign.

htf: Rowi needs to get a well deserved noogie for what he did. It was a literal gamble. And while it could feel a bit out of character, in reality it isn't; in my mind he was just trying to see for the bunny side of his extended family. Sawi is completely justified in being annoyed though.

item.title: Page 5
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
:I

Russet: Despite everything Ck'akk is looking at the big picture.
No short term political plans here, she is focused on the whole Avali Empire & stopping the Horker Kings and she knows the bunnies are a step toward that goal.
She is a good bird for an Intergalactic Space Leader.
Also remember the ocean is Purple because she is on Avalon

htf: Funny enough, I don't see her as very selfless. In my mind the political play is stronger than it feels. Ck'akk is focused in her enemy (the Horker King) and bunnies are just a step towards that. In my mind, if there was another way, she would take it and leave bunnies behind if it was better that way for the Avali. The fact she calls the species being uplifted by the Horkers "some random inferior species" hints at that- A very slight and subtle display of specie-ism. That been said, she is being good and helpful in spite of her motivations, and that's important.

item.title: Page 6
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Long run

Russet: Well fudge, seems the HK is thinking long term too!
Stop being smart like Ck'akk you nob!!!

htf: I mean, if he wasn't smart, Horkers wouldnt be conquering so well and efficiently and they likely would've pissed off others a lot earlier.

item.title: Page 7
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Party

Russet: Despite all the political rambling PARTY! The Not-Friends from space left!!!!

htf: The best reason to celebrate!

item.title: Page 8
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Oh no, lots of text again
Unfortunately thats a given when legal matters are involved.

Russet: Rowi got in so much trouble for this! Everyone in his pack gave him a hard time for going well over-board and not giving anyone any warning.
He did after all nearly ruin them as a family!
But hey Diplomacy!!

htf: I dont know if he would've ruined them as a family, but it was certainly a very stressful gamble and he really should've told at least Sawi of his plan. Unless what Rowi did was something he thought in that exact moment and went for it without thinking twice. And... I have no idea if that would've made it better or worse.

item.title: Page 9
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Quality

Russet: Oh! Oh Rowi you are so getting shouted at even more by your siblings.

htf: Probably not, this one is a positive one.

item.title: Page 10
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Moving out

Russet: Yeah... Rowi is so getting ribbed for this!
I mean the Ouakkia pack are up for helping the Bunnies but this does mean uprooting their entire life.... he is so getting so many more noogies.

htf: On the other hand... they're getting a much higher salary, more than double. If the pack was rich already, now they'll be richer. And they're climbing in the Avali social ladder even more now since they're going to be literally the pack leading the mission in a new planet. So I don't know if he'll be getting noogies. Probably some well deserved scolding though.

item.title: Chapter 13 Lore Page
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Newspaper

Russet: This is actually quite important.
As there are bound to be opportunistic types who'd see a planet and species the Avali care enough to uplift and want to find out why.
BPE as we know is stonking rich in rare minerals so closing the boarders is important to keep the Bunnies and the planet safe.

htf: I wanted to imply that this is standard procedure. Also this addresses a complain I got during a previous chapter about the "Anti-predator net", that it was problematic against the environment/native wildlife/local ecosphere, essentially not only saying Avali do that every time but that they even have a reasoning for it.

item.title: Page 12
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Exhaustion

Russet: Mekari LORGE

htf: He is! <3

item.title: Page 13
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Kicked out

Russet: Despite everything Sawi loves her family and isn't afraid to remind them that she is the pack leader, especially when their health is involved.
And Rowi knows better then to try and argue with her.
Big sis vibes.

htf: There's a reason why she's the pack leader, after all.

item.title: Page 14
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Dome houses

Russet: I think Vic watched too much Dragonball Z.. but hey domes are cool!

htf: >w>

item.title: Page 15
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Chapter done. It was a very fast paced one, and that was intentional; I had to set up the new background for the incoming chapters. That’s also why this chapter had a lot of alien politics in it.
This chapter was also a posting challenge due to me falling very sick. This is the reason why ch14 is gonna be delayed; originally i expected to complete this now in April and ch14 in June, but I will put on a safe bet and say ch14 will come in August, even tho there are chances its done before that.
Anyways, I hope you liked this! More raptor bird friends is always good. I’ll be introducing them properly as they come.
-Vic

Russet: This was a great chapter to work on together and we got to put to use all the cool lore we had created for the Avali.

htf: And also to show that while Rowi is a smart birb in the band, that he's not flawlessly smart, he can be reckless and stuff. It was a subtle development, but a character development after all.

item.title: Page 0
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Hello!
I won’t bore you with a lot of the stuff that happened IRL the last few months, but stuff happened xD But recovery happened, I’m back and Chapter 14 will start coming on July 27th!
See you then!

Russet: it has been a time but we are back babies!

item.description:
Human

Russet: The Biosculpting genes are dominant. So Ds mother was human, and his Dad's genes got passed onto him. But his sister is human.

htf: Its likely that when D's dad did the biosculpting thing he didn't know (or anyone, for that matter) that the biosculpting genes would become dominant.

item.title: Page 18
item.dc:creator: htfcuddles
item.description:
Chapter is done.

This chapter was extremely challenging to make. Not precisely due to the content- I knew from many chapters ago that this one was going to be dedicated to D- but because I got sick and started this during my worst days, often when I barely had strength to move. Working on this essentially gave me joy and gave me some ground when I felt like I was losing everything, but that also meant making this chapter alone took 3-5 months.

Anyways, I’m extremely happy with the events of this chapter. The couple that had been in the planning since two years and six months ago is finally official as well. I am very happy because I also managed to create a backstory chapter without using any flashbacks, a challenge I wanted to tackle on for this.

Thanks for enjoying, reading and for your support. See you in a few months!
-

Russet: it took us awhile to work out how to close this final page.
But this really just struck a chord with us both, Roi outlining how this is all going to change the world and society of bunnies so much.

See you in Chapter 15

htf: Yes!
